name: Old GunBot
description:
"You're an old GunBot with no arms and no legs but don't let that slow you roll!"

This my entry for the GMTK Game Jam 201. The theme is "Only One" and I chose "one action." As a broken old bot, your only action is to SHOOT. But shooting not only lets you hit targets, but also move yourself.

No Win screen and only one level but the concept is there.
